result.execSummary:
The defendant Anthony M Kralewski was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Falsely Present Noncontrolled Substance [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(4)(am)1a.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: $290.60 fine/cost to be paid to the Clerk of Court's Office in a payment plan of $25.00 per month beginning July 1, 2016, and due on the first of each month thereafter until paid in full.
Must pay a $250.00 DNA surcharge to the Clerk of Court's Office.  Bond in 15CF339 to be applied.
Must complete HSED or GED while on Probation.
May not possess or use firearms.
May not vote or hold public office until civil rights are restored.

Must provide DNA sample.
Must complete an AODA assessment & comply with recommendations.

timeConds.notes: Banked/stayed for use by Probation if necessary.

supervisions.notes: Subject to Good Time & Work Release.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Anthony M Kralewski

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.
